documentType: grand jury subpoena and airline records
summary: This document is a grand jury subpoena from the Southern District of New York to American Airlines, dated January 23, 2020, demanding travel records for Ghislaine Maxwell and other individuals for specified periods. The subpoena is signed by U.S. Attorney Geoffrey S. Berman. Attached are numerous American Airlines passenger records, including detailed itineraries and booking information for flights in 2019, some in the name of Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as an individual for whom American Airlines must provide all travel records from January 1, 1994 through December 31, 1998, and from July 1, 2019 through the date of service. Also appears as a passenger on multiple flights in 2019.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.role: United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Signed the grand jury subpoena demanding records from American Airlines.

persons.name: Jinsol Jung
persons.context: Appears in the PNR history as the agent who made or modified bookings for a flight itinerary.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, issued a grand jury subpoena targeting Maxwell's travel records as part of a federal investigation.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance Date
events.description: American Airlines was commanded to appear before the Grand Jury for the Southern District of New York to testify and produce records.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: The subpoena was issued to American Airlines for records related to Ghislaine Maxwell and others.

events.title: Flight Booking (Record Locator LNYPJ)
events.description: A flight itinerary was booked from Los Angeles (LAX) to Boston (BOS) on September 22, 2019, and return on October 1, 2019.

events.title: Flight Booking (Record Locator EQHCVH)
events.description: A flight itinerary was booked from Austin (AUS) to New York (JFK) on September 27, 2019, and return on September 29, 2019, associated with Disney Global Travel.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Flight
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell flew from Los Angeles (LAX) to Philadelphia (PHL) to Manchester, NH (MHT) on August 4, 2019.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Flight
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell flew from Manchester, NH (MHT) to Charlotte (CLT) to Los Angeles (LAX) on July 19, 2019.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, New York, NY
keyFacts: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued to American Airlines on January 23, 2020, seeking all travel records for Ghislaine Maxwell from 1994-1998 and from July 2019 onward.
The subpoena includes a request for non-disclosure due to the ongoing nature of the investigation.
Attached airline records show detailed passenger itineraries and booking data from 2019, including several flights booked in the name of Ghislaine Maxwell.
The subpoena is signed by Geoffrey S. Berman, then U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York.
The document reveals the use of grand jury power to collect travel evidence as part of a federal investigation into potential violations including sex trafficking (18 U.S.C. ยง 1591).
